original_text: Anyone who says that is wrong. If dead people do not live again, then Christ did not rise up after his death. He would still be dead.
korean_text: 만일 죽은 자의 부활이 없으면 그리스도도 다시 살아나지 못하셨으리라

sentences.original_text: Anyone who says that is wrong
If dead people do not live again
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 죽은 사람들이 다시 살지 않는다면

sentences.original_text: then Christ did not rise up
